trans-unit.source: Programming Note: center has obvious application for normalizing statistical data. It is also useful for improving the precision of general numerical calculations. Whenever there is a large value that is common to a batch of data, the mean can be subtracted off, the calculation performed, and then the mean added back to obtain the final answer.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明： center 在标准化统计数据方面有明显的应用。这对于提高通用数值计算的精度也很有用。只要有一批数据共有一个大值，就可以减去均值，执行计算，然后再加回平均值以获得最终答案。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: deal is often used with comma separated lists derived from cell arrays or structures. This is unnecessary as the interpreter can perform the same action without the overhead of a function call. For example:
trans-unit.target: 编程说明： deal 通常与从单元格数组或结构派生的逗号分隔列表一起使用。这是不必要的，因为解释器可以执行相同的动作而无需调用函数。例如：

trans-unit.target: 编程说明：重复出现时， erase 会删除字符串中某个模式的第一个实例。例如：

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: isprime is appropriate if the maximum value in x is not too large (< 1e15). For larger values special purpose factorization code should be used.
trans-unit.target: 编程注意：如果 x 中的最大值不太大（<1e15），则使用 isprime 是合适的。对于较大的值，应使用专用分解因子代码。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: meshgrid is restricted to 2-D or 3-D grid generation. The ndgrid function will generate 1-D through N-D grids. However, the functions are not completely equivalent. If x is a vector of length M and y is a vector of length N, then meshgrid will produce an output grid which is NxM. ndgrid will produce an output which is MxN (transpose) for the same input. Some core functions expect meshgrid input and others expect ndgrid input. Check the documentation for the function in question to determine the proper input format.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明： meshgrid 仅限于2D或3D网格生成。该 ndgrid 功能将产生通过ND栅1,2-d。但是，功能并不完全等效。如果 x 是长度M的向量，而 y 是长度N的向量，则 meshgrid 将产生输出栅格NxM。对于相同的输入， ndgrid 将产生一个输出MxN（转置）。一些核心功能需要 meshgrid 输入，而其他一些核心功能则需要 ndgrid 输入。请查阅有关功能的文档，以确定正确的输入格式。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: nargin does not work on compiled functions (
trans-unit.target: 编程说明： nargin 不适用于已编译的函数（

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: ndgrid is very similar to the function meshgrid except that the first two dimensions are transposed in comparison to meshgrid. Some core functions expect meshgrid input and others expect ndgrid input. Check the documentation for the function in question to determine the proper input format.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明： ndgrid 与 meshgrid 函数非常相似，不同之处在于，与 meshgrid 相比，前两个维度已转置。一些核心功能需要 meshgrid 输入，而其他一些核心功能则需要 ndgrid 输入。请查阅有关功能的文档，以确定正确的输入格式。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: ppval evaluates polynomials at xi - breaks(i), i.e., it subtracts the lower endpoint of the current interval from xi. This must be taken into account when creating piecewise polynomials objects with mkpp.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明： ppval 在 xi - breaks(i) 处评估多项式，即，它从 xi 中减去当前间隔的下限。使用 mkpp 创建分段多项式对象时，必须考虑到这一点。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: shg is equivalent to figure (gcf) assuming that a current figure exists.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明： shg 等效于 figure (gcf) 假定存在当前图形。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: whitebg operates by changing the color properties of the children of the specified figures. Only objects with a single color are affected. For example, a patch with a single "FaceColor" will be changed, but a patch with shading ("interp") will not be modified. For inversion, the new color is simply the inversion in RGB space: cnew = [1-R 1-G 1-B]. When a color is specified, the axes and figure are set to the new color, and the color of child objects are then adjusted to have some contrast (visibility) against the new background.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明： whitebg 通过更改指定图形的子级的颜色属性进行操作。仅单色对象会受到影响。例如，将更改具有单个 "FaceColor" 的色块，但不会修改具有阴影（ "interp" ）的色块。对于反转，新颜色就是RGB空间中的反转： cnew = [1-R 1-G 1-B] 。指定颜色后，将轴和图形设置为新颜色，然后将子对象的颜色调整为与新背景具有某种对比度（可见性）。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: All non-numeric values (NaNs) of <var>x</var> are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明： <var>x</var> 的所有非数字值（NaNs）将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: An hggroup is a way to group base graphics objects such as line objects or patch objects into a single unit which can react appropriately. For example, the individual lines of a contour plot are collected into a single hggroup so that they can be made visible/invisible with a single command, set (hg_handle, "visible", "off").
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：hggroup是将基本图形对象（例如线对象或面片对象）分组为一个可以适当反应的单元的方法。例如，将等高线图的各条线收集到单个hggroup中，以便可以使用单个命令 set (hg_handle, "visible", "off") 使它们可见/不可见。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: Because the named file is not opened by tempname, it is possible, though relatively unlikely, that it will not be available by the time your program attempts to open it. If this is a concern, see tmpfile.
trans-unit.target: 编程注意：由于命名文件不是由 tempname 打开的，因此，尽管相对不太可能，但是在您的程序尝试打开该文件时，该文件将不可用。如果这是一个问题，请参阅 tmpfile 。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: Deleting graphics objects is the proper way to remove features from a plot without clearing the entire figure.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明:删除图形对象是在不清除整个图形的情况下从图中删除特征的正确方法。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: Flushing is useful for ensuring that all pending output makes it to the screen before some other event occurs. For example, it is always a good idea to flush the standard output stream before calling input.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：刷新对于确保所有未决的输出在发生其他事件之前先进入屏幕很有用。例如，在调用 input 之前刷新标准输出流总是一个好主意。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: If <var>name</var> is implemented by a buggy .oct/.mex file, calling <var>exist</var> may cause Octave to crash. To maintain high performance, Octave trusts .oct/.mex files instead of sandboxing them.
trans-unit.target: 编程注意：如果 <var>name</var> 由错误的.oct / .mex文件实现，则调用 <var>exist</var> 可能会导致Octave崩溃。为了保持高性能，Octave信任.oct / .mex文件，而不是对其进行沙箱处理。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: It is often more useful to test for a specific object type. To determine if a handle belongs to a graphics object use ishghandle or isgraphics. To determine if a handle belongs to a Java object use isjava.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：测试特定的对象类型通常更有用。要确定句柄是否属于图形对象，请使用 ishghandle 或 isgraphics 。要确定句柄是否属于Java对象，请使用 isjava 。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: Octave does not yet implement string arrays so this function will always return false.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明:Octave还没有实现字符串数组,所以这个函数总是返回false。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: The xlim function operates by modifying the "xlim" and "xlimmode" properties of an axes object. These properties can be directly inspected and altered with get/set.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明： xlim 函数通过修改轴对象的 "xlim" 和 "xlimmode" 属性进行操作。这些属性可以直接使用 get / set 进行检查和更改。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: The ability of lookfor to correctly identify the first sentence of the help text is dependent on the format of the function’s help. All Octave core functions are correctly formatted, but the same can not be guaranteed for external packages and user-supplied functions. Therefore, the use of the "-all" argument may be necessary to find related functions that are not a part of Octave.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明： lookfor 能够正确识别帮助文本的第一句的能力取决于函数帮助的格式。所有Octave核心功能均已正确格式化，但不能保证外部软件包和用户提供的功能具有相同的格式。因此，可能需要使用 "-all" 参数来查找不属于Octave的相关功能。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: The color axis affects the display of image, patch, and surface graphics objects, but only if the "cdata" property has indexed data and the "cdatamapping" property is set to "scaled". Graphic objects with true color cdata, or "direct"cdatamapping are not affected.
trans-unit.target: 编程注：色轴影响图像，补丁，和表面图形对象的显示，但仅当 "cdata" 属性有索引的数据和 "cdatamapping" 属性设置为 "scaled" 。颜色为 cdata 或 "direct" cdatamapping 的图形对象不受影响。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: The command clear name only clears the variable name when both a variable and a (shadowed) function named name are currently defined. For example, suppose you have defined a function foo, and then hidden it by performing the assignment foo = 2. Executing the command clear foo once will clear the variable definition and restore the definition of foo as a function. Executing clear foo a second time will clear the function definition.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：仅当当前同时定义了变量和（ name 为name的）（阴影）函数时，命令 clear name 才清除变量 name 。例如，假设您已经定义了一个函数 foo ，然后通过执行赋值 foo = 2 将其隐藏。执行一次命令 clear foo 将清除变量定义并将 foo 的定义恢复为函数。第二次执行 clear foo 将清除函数定义。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: The gamma function can grow quite large even for small input values. In many cases it may be preferable to use the natural logarithm of the gamma function (gammaln) in calculations to minimize loss of precision. The final result is then exp (result_using_gammaln).
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：即使对于较小的输入值，伽玛函数也会变得很大。在许多情况下，最好在计算中使用伽玛函数（ gammaln ）的自然对数，以最大程度地降低精度损失。最终结果是 exp (result_using_gammaln).

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: The maximum length of <var>v</var> should be less than or equal to 10 to limit memory consumption.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明： <var>v</var> 的最大长度应小于或等于10，以限制内存消耗。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: The property "outdim" can be used to save memory when the output of fcn has many dimensions, or when a wrapper to the base function that selects the desired outputs is too costly. When memory is not an issue, the easiest way to select output dimensions is to first calculate the complete result with movfun and then filter that result with indexing. If code complexity is not an issue then a wrapper can be created using anonymous functions. For example, if basefcn is a function returning a K-dimensional row output, and only dimension D is desired, then the following wrapper could be used.
trans-unit.target: 编程注意：当 fcn 的输出具有很多尺寸时，或者选择所需输出的基本函数的包装太昂贵时，可以使用属性 "outdim" 来节省内存。当内存不是问题时，选择输出尺寸的最简单方法是首先使用 movfun 计算完整结果，然后使用索引对结果进行过滤。如果代码复杂度不是问题，则可以使用匿名函数创建包装器。例如，如果 basefcn 是返回 K 维行输出的函数，并且仅需要维 D ，则可以使用以下包装器。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: The root graphics object is identified by the special handle value of 0. At some point this unique value may change, but code can be made resistant to future changes by using groot which is guaranteed to always return the root graphics object.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：根图形对象由特殊的句柄值0标识。在某些时候，此唯一值可能会更改，但是可以通过使用 groot 保证代码始终抵御根图形对象，从而使代码可以抵抗将来的更改。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: The use of inline is discouraged and it may be removed from a future version of Octave. The preferred way to create functions from strings is through the use of anonymous functions (see Anonymous Functions) or str2func.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：不建议使用 inline ，并且可以从以后的Octave版本中删除它。从字符串创建函数的首选方法是使用匿名函数（请参阅匿名函数）或 str2func 。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: The value returned by P_tmpdir is always the default location. This value may not agree with that returned from tempdir if the user has overridden the default with the TMPDIR environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明： P_tmpdir 返回的值始终是默认位置。如果用户已使用 TMPDIR 环境变量覆盖默认值，则此值可能与 tempdir 返回的值不一致。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: The value returned by this function is not necessarily the same as the one returned by gcbo during callback execution. An executing callback can be interrupted by another callback and the current object may be changed.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：该函数返回的值不必与回调执行期间 gcbo 返回的值相同。执行中的回调可以被另一个回调中断，并且当前对象可以更改。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: This function is a wrapper which calls movfun. For additional options and documentation, See movfun.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：该函数是一个包装，调用 movfun 。有关其他选项和文档，请参见movfun。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: This function is provided for <small>MATLAB</small> compatibility, but recycling is not implemented in Octave. To help avoid accidental data loss an error will be raised if an attempt is made to enable file recycling.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：提供此功能是为了与<small>MATLAB</small>兼容，但在Octave中未实现回收。为了避免意外的数据丢失，如果尝试启用文件回收，将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: This function relies on the object <var>val</var> having a conversion method named <var>type</var>. User-defined classes may implement only a subset of the full list of types shown above. In that case, it may be necessary to call cast twice in order to reach the desired type. For example, the conversion to double is nearly always implemented, but the conversion to uint8 might not be. In that case, the following code will work
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：该函数依赖于对象 <var>val</var> ，该对象val的转换方法名为 <var>type</var> 。用户定义的类可能仅实现上述类型的完整列表的子集。在这种情况下，可能需要两次调用强制类型转换才能达到所需的类型。例如，几乎总是实现向double的转换，但可能不会实现。在这种情况下，以下代码将起作用

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: When calculating the binomial coefficient nchoosek works only for non-negative, integer arguments. Use bincoeff for non-integer and negative scalar arguments, or for computing many binomial coefficients at once with vector inputs for n or k.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：计算二项式系数时， nchoosek 仅适用于非负整数参数。对非整数和负标量参数使用 bincoeff ，或者使用向量输入 n 或 k 一次计算许多二项式系数。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: When producing graphics for final publication use print or saveas. When it is important to be able to continue to edit a figure as an Octave object, use hgsave/hgload.
trans-unit.target: 编程注意：为最终发布制作图形时，请使用 print 或 saveas 。重要的是要能够继续将图形编辑为八度对象，请使用 hgsave / hgload 。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: When specifying bin centers with the bins input, the edges for bins 2 to N-1 are spaced so that bins(i) is centered between the edges. The final edge is drawn halfway between bin N and bin 1. This guarantees that all input th will be placed into one of the bins, but also means that for some combinations bin 1 and bin N may not be centered on the user’s given values.
trans-unit.target: 编程注意：当使用 bins 输入指定bin中心时，bin 2到N-1的边是隔开的，因此 bins(i) 在边缘之间居中。最终边缘绘制在bin N和bin 1之间的中间位置。这确保将所有输入 th 放置到bin中的一个中，但是这也意味着对于某些组合，bin 1和bin N可能不会以用户给定的值为中心。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: With one output rat produces a string which is a continued fraction expansion. To produce a string which is a simple fraction (one numerator, one denominator) use rats.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：使用一个输出 rat 时,将生成一个字符串，该字符串是连续的分数扩展。要产生一个简单分数（一个分子，一个分母）的字符串，请使用 rats 。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: if you are only using eval as an error-capturing mechanism, rather than for the execution of arbitrary code strings, Consider using try/catch blocks or unwind_protect/unwind_protect_cleanup blocks instead. These techniques have higher performance and don’t introduce the security considerations that the evaluation of arbitrary code does.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：如果仅将 eval 用作错误捕获机制，而不是用于执行任意代码字符串，请考虑改用try / catch块或unwind_protect / unwind_protect_cleanup块。这些技术具有更高的性能，并且没有引入任意代码评估所具有的安全性考虑。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: nth_element encapsulates the C++ standard library algorithms nth_element and partial_sort. On average, the complexity of the operation is O(M*log(K)), where M = size (x, dim) and K = length (n). This function is intended for cases where the ratio K/M is small; otherwise, it may be better to use sort.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：nth_element封装了C ++标准库算法nth_element和partial_sort。平均而言，运算的复杂度为O（M * log（K）），其中 M = size (x, dim) 和 K = length (n) 。此功能适用于K / M比较小的情况；否则，最好使用 sort 。

trans-unit.source: Programming Note: the code is a wrapper to the corresponding <small>LAPACK</small> dggsvd and zggsvd routines.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：该代码是对应的<small>LAPACK</small> dggsvd和zggsvd例程的包装。

trans-unit.source: Programming Notes:
trans-unit.target: 方案编制说明:

trans-unit.source: Programming Notes: humps has two local maxima located near x = 0.300 and 0.893, a local minimum near x = 0.637, and zeros near x = -0.132 and 1.300. humps is a useful function for testing algorithms which find zeros or local minima and maxima.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明： humps 在 x = 0.300和0.893 附近具有两个局部最大值，在 x = 0.637 附近具有局部最小值，在 x = -0.132和1.300 附近具有零。 humps 对于测试找到零或局部最小值和最大值的算法非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Programming Notes: If there are singularities within the integration region it is best to split the integral and place the singularities on the boundary.
trans-unit.target: 编程注意事项。如果在积分区域内有奇点,最好将积分分开,并将奇点放在边界上。

trans-unit.source: Programming Notes: Routines from <small>LAPACK</small> are used for full matrices and code from <small>UMFPACK</small> is used for sparse matrices.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：来自<small>LAPACK的</small>例程用于完整矩阵，而来自<small>UMFPACK的</small>代码用于稀疏矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Programming Notes: The search for a minimum is restricted to be in the finite interval bound by a and b. If you have only one initial point to begin searching from then you will need to use an unconstrained minimization algorithm such as fminunc or fminsearch. fminbnd internally uses a Golden Section search strategy.
trans-unit.target: 编程注意事项：最小值的搜索限制在 a 和 b 限制的有限间隔内。如果只有一个起始点开始搜索，则需要使用无约束的最小化算法，例如 fminunc 或 fminsearch 。 fminbnd 内部使用黄金分割搜索策略。

trans-unit.source: Programming Notes: When calculating with floating point numbers (double, single), values within a few eps of an integer will be rounded to that integer before computation for compatibility with MATLAB. Any floating point integers greater than flintmax (2^53 for double) will not compute correctly. For larger integer values convert the input to uint64 before calling this function.
trans-unit.target: 编程说明：当使用浮点数（双精度，单精度）进行计算时，整数的几个eps内的值将在计算前四舍五入为该整数，以便与MATLAB兼容。任何大于 flintmax （两倍为2 ^ 53）的浮点整数将无法正确计算。对于较大的整数值， uint64 在调用此函数之前将输入转换为uint64。

trans-unit.target: 相对MIP间隙公差达到。

trans-unit.source: Relative error tolerance.
trans-unit.target: 相对容错率。

trans-unit.source: Relative tolerance parameter. Unlike the absolute tolerance, this parameter may only be a scalar.
trans-unit.target: 相对容差参数。与绝对公差不同,该参数只能是一个标量。

trans-unit.source: Relative tolerance used to check if the current basic solution is integer feasible. It is not recommended that you change this parameter unless you have a detailed understanding of its purpose.
trans-unit.target: 相对容差用于检查当前基本解是否为整数可行。除非你对其目的有详细的了解,否则不建议你改变这个参数。

trans-unit.source: Relative tolerance used to check if the current basic solution is primal feasible. It is not recommended that you change this parameter unless you have a detailed understanding of its purpose.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查当前基本解是否原始可行的相对公差。除非您对其目的有详细的了解,否则不建议您改变这个参数。

trans-unit.source: Relative tolerance used to check if the value of the objective function is not better than in the best known integer feasible solution. It is not recommended that you change this parameter unless you have a detailed understanding of its purpose.
trans-unit.target: 相对容差用于检查目标函数的值是否不优于已知最佳整数可行解。除非你对其目的有详细了解,否则不建议你改变这个参数。

trans-unit.source: Relative tolerance used to choose eligible pivotal elements of the simplex table. It is not recommended that you change this parameter unless you have a detailed understanding of its purpose.
trans-unit.target: 用于选择符合条件的简表中的中枢元素的相对容差。除非您对其目的有详细的了解,否则不建议您改变这个参数。

trans-unit.source: Relative tolerance. May be either vector or scalar. If a vector, it must match the dimension of the state vector, and the absolute tolerance must also be a vector of the same length.
trans-unit.target: 相对公差。可以是向量或标量。如果是向量,必须与状态向量的维度相匹配,绝对容差也必须是相同长度的向量。

trans-unit.source: Reporting Bugs
trans-unit.target: 报告错误

trans-unit.source: Reporting a bug may help you by bringing a solution to your problem, or it may not. In any case, the principal function of a bug report is to help the entire community by making the next version of Octave work better. Bug reports are your contribution to the maintenance of Octave.
trans-unit.target: 报告bug可能会帮助你解决你的问题,也可能不会。无论如何,Bug报告的主要功能是帮助整个社区,使Octave的下一个版本更好地运行。错误报告是您对Octave维护的贡献。

trans-unit.source: Result out of range.

trans-unit.source: Results are returned in inverse lexicographic order. The result has size factorial (n) * n, where n is the length of v. Any repetitions are included in the output. To generate just the unique permutations use unique (perms (v), "rows")(end:-1:1,:).
trans-unit.target: 结果以逆字典顺序返回。结果的大小为 factorial (n) * n ，其中 n 是 v 的长度。任何重复都包含在输出中。要仅生成唯一排列，请使用 unique (perms (v), "rows")(end:-1:1,:) 。

trans-unit.source: Return a copy of <var>x</var> with the elements rotated counterclockwise in 90-degree increments.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 的副本，其中元素以逆时针方向旋转90度。

trans-unit.source: Return a copy of <var>x</var> with the order of the columns reversed. In other words, <var>x</var> is flipped left-to-right about a vertical axis. For example:
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 的副本，其中列的顺序相反。换句话说， <var>x</var> 绕垂直轴左右翻转。例如：

trans-unit.source: Return a copy of <var>x</var> with the order of the rows reversed. In other words, <var>x</var> is flipped upside-down about a horizontal axis. For example:
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 的副本，其中行的顺序相反。换句话说， <var>x</var> 围绕水平轴上下翻转。例如：

trans-unit.source: Return a copy of array <var>x</var> flipped across dimension <var>dim</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回数组 <var>x</var> 的副本，该数组跨过维度 <var>dim</var> 翻转。

trans-unit.source: Return a copy of the string or cell string <var>s</var>, with each lowercase character replaced by the corresponding uppercase one; non-alphabetic characters are left unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串或单元格字符串 <var>s</var> 的副本，每个小写字符都被相应的大写字母替换；非字母字符保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Return a copy of the string or cell string <var>s</var>, with each uppercase character replaced by the corresponding lowercase one; non-alphabetic characters are left unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串 <var>s</var> 或单元格字符串s的副本，每个大写字符均被对应的小写字母替换；非字母字符保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Return a diagonal matrix with vector <var>v</var> on diagonal <var>k</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回对角线 <var>k</var> 上向量为 <var>v</var> 的对角矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return a duplicate file descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个重复的文件描述符。

trans-unit.source: Return a full storage matrix from a sparse, diagonal, or permutation matrix, or a range.
trans-unit.target: 从稀疏矩阵、对角矩阵、排列矩阵或一个范围返回一个完整的存储矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return a function handle constructed from the string <var>fcn_name</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回由字符串 <var>fcn_name</var> 构造的函数句柄。

trans-unit.source: Return a gray colormap that maximizes the contrast in an image.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个能使图像对比度最大化的灰色柱状图。

trans-unit.source: Return a handle <var>h</var> to a new progress indicator ("waitbar") object.
trans-unit.target: 将句柄 <var>h</var> 返回到新的进度指示器（“ waitbar”）对象。

trans-unit.source: Return a handle to further manipulate the light object
trans-unit.target: 返回一个句柄,用于进一步操作光对象。

trans-unit.source: Return a handle to the current axes object.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前轴对象的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Return a handle to the current figure.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前数字的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Return a handle to the current object of the current figure, or a handle to the current object of the figure with handle <var>fig</var>.
trans-unit.target: 将句柄返回到当前图形的当前对象，或者使用句柄 <var>fig</var> 返回到图形的当前对象的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Return a handle to the figure containing the object whose callback is currently executing.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含当前正在执行回调的对象的图的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Return a handle to the object whose callback is currently executing.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前正在执行回调的对象的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Return a handle to the root graphics object.
trans-unit.target: 返回根图形对象的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Return a list of all local functions, i.e., subfunctions, within the current file.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前文件中所有本地函数(即子函数)的列表。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array <var>y</var> corresponding to the raw bit patterns of <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 <var>x</var> 的原始位模式相对应的逻辑数组 <var>y</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>s</var> are ASCII characters (in the range 0 to 127 decimal) and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>s</var> 的元素是ASCII字符（范围为0到127，十进制），则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>s</var> are control characters and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>s</var> 的元素是控制字符，则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>s</var> are decimal digits (0-9) and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，当 <var>s</var> 的元素为十进制数字（0-9）时为true，否则为false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>s</var> are hexadecimal digits (0-9 and a-fA-F).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，该数组为true，其中 <var>s</var> 的元素为十六进制数字（0-9和a-fA-F）。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>s</var> are letters and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>s</var> 的元素是字母，则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>s</var> are letters or digits and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>s</var> 的元素是字母或数字，则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>s</var> are lowercase letters and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>s</var> 的元素为小写字母，则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>s</var> are printable characters (but not the space character) and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>s</var> 的元素是可打印字符（而不是空格字符），则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>s</var> are printable characters (including the space character) and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>s</var> 的元素是可打印字符（包括空格字符），则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>s</var> are punctuation characters and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>s</var> 的元素为标点字符，则为true；否则为false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>s</var> are uppercase letters and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>s</var> 的元素为大写字母，则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>s</var> are whitespace characters (space, formfeed, newline, carriage return, tab, and vertical tab) and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>s</var> 的元素为空白字符（空格，换页符，换行符，回车，制表符和垂直制表符），则为true；否则为false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>x</var> are NA (missing) values and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>x</var> 的元素是NA（缺失）值，则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>x</var> are NaN values and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>x</var> 的元素是NaN值，则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>x</var> are finite values and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>x</var> 的元素是有限值，则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>x</var> are infinite and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>x</var> 的元素是无限的，则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical array which is true where the elements of <var>x</var> are prime numbers and false where they are not.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个逻辑数组，如果 <var>x</var> 的元素是质数，则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Return a logical matrix <var>tf</var> with the same shape as <var>a</var> which is true (1) if the element in <var>a</var> is found in <var>s</var> and false (0) if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 返回形状与 <var>a</var> 相同的逻辑矩阵 <var>tf</var> ，如果在 <var>s</var> 中找到 <var>a</var> 中的元素，则为true（1），否则为false（0）。

trans-unit.source: Return a matrix of random samples from the empirical distribution obtained from the univariate sample <var>data</var>.
trans-unit.target: 从单变量样本 <var>data</var> 获得的经验分布返回随机样本矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return a matrix of random samples from the univariate distribution which assumes the values in <var>v</var> with probabilities <var>p</var>.
trans-unit.target: 从单变量分布返回一个随机样本矩阵，该矩阵假设 <var>v</var> 中的值具有概率 <var>p</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return a matrix or N-dimensional array whose elements are all 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个矩阵或N维数组,其元素均为0。

trans-unit.source: Return a matrix or N-dimensional array whose elements are all 1.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个矩阵或N维数组,其元素均为1。

trans-unit.source: Return a matrix or N-dimensional array whose elements are all logical 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个矩阵或N维数组,其元素均为逻辑0。

trans-unit.source: Return a matrix or N-dimensional array whose elements are all logical 1.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个矩阵或N维数组,其元素均为逻辑1。

trans-unit.source: Return a matrix with gamma (a,1) distributed random elements.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有 gamma (a,1) 分布的随机元素的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return a matrix with Poisson distributed random elements with mean value parameter given by the first argument, <var>l</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有泊松分布的随机元素的矩阵，其均值参数由第一个参数 <var>l</var> 给出。

trans-unit.source: Return a matrix with exponentially distributed random elements.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个随机元素指数分布的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return a matrix with normally distributed random elements having zero mean and variance one.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个均值为零、方差为1的正态分布随机元素矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return a matrix with random elements uniformly distributed on the interval (0, 1).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个在区间(0,1)上均匀分布的随机元素矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return a matrix with the specified dimensions (<var>m</var>, <var>n</var>, …) whose elements are taken from the matrix <var>A</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个矩阵具有指定尺寸（ <var>m</var> ， <var>n</var> ，...），其元素从矩阵采取 <var>A</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return a new array <var>y</var> resulting from interpreting the data of <var>x</var> in memory as data of the numeric class <var>class</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回将内存中 <var>x</var> 的数据解释为数字类 <var>class</var> 的数据而得到的新数组 <var>y</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return a new array <var>y</var> resulting from interpreting the logical array <var>x</var> as raw bit patterns for data of the numeric class <var>class</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回将逻辑数组 <var>x</var> 解释为数字类 <var>class</var> 数据的原始位模式而得到的新数组 <var>y</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return a new matrix formed by extracting the lower triangular part of the matrix <var>A</var>, and setting all other elements to zero.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过提取矩阵 <var>A</var> 的下三角部分并将所有其他元素设置为零而形成的新矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return a new matrix formed by extracting the upper triangular part of the matrix <var>A</var>, and setting all other elements to zero.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过提取矩阵 <var>A</var> 的上三角部分并将所有其他元素设置为零而形成的新矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return a non-negative number on success and EOF on error.
trans-unit.target: 成功时返回一个非负数,错误时返回EOF。

trans-unit.source: Return a non-negative number on success or EOF on error.
trans-unit.target: 成功时返回一个非负数,错误时返回EOF。

trans-unit.source: Return a path constructed from <var>dir</var> and all its subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 返回从 <var>dir</var> 及其所有子目录构造的路径。

trans-unit.source: Return a row vector containing a random permutation of 1:n.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含 1:n 的随机排列的行向量。

trans-unit.source: Return a row vector with <var>n</var> elements logarithmically spaced from 10^<var>a</var> to 10^<var>b</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个行向量，其中 <var>n</var> 个元素的对数间距为10 ^ <var>a</var> 至10 ^ <var>b</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return a row vector with <var>n</var> linearly spaced elements between <var>start</var> and <var>end</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回在 <var>start</var> 和 <var>end</var> 之间具有 <var>n</var> 个线性间隔元素的行向量。

trans-unit.source: Return a row vector with the size (number of elements) of each dimension for the object <var>a</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回对象 <var>a</var> 的每个维度的大小（元素数）的行向量。

trans-unit.source: Return a scalar, matrix or N-dimensional array whose elements are all eps, the machine precision.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个标量、矩阵或N维数组,其元素均为eps,即机器精度。

trans-unit.source: Return a scalar, matrix or N-dimensional array whose elements are all equal to the IEEE representation for positive infinity.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个标量、矩阵或N维数组,其元素都等于正无穷的IEEE表示法。

trans-unit.source: Return a scalar, matrix, or N-dimensional array whose elements are all equal to the IEEE symbol NaN (Not a Number).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个标量、矩阵或N维数组,其元素都等于IEEE符号NaN(Not a Number)。

trans-unit.source: Return a scalar, matrix, or N-dimensional array whose elements are all equal to the base of natural logarithms.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个标量、矩阵或N维数组,其元素都等于自然对数的基数。

trans-unit.source: Return a scalar, matrix, or N-dimensional array whose elements are all equal to the largest floating point number that is representable.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个标量、矩阵或N维数组,其元素都等于可表示的最大浮点数。

trans-unit.source: Return a scalar, matrix, or N-dimensional array whose elements are all equal to the pure imaginary unit, defined as sqrt (-1).
trans-unit.target: 返回标量，矩阵或N维数组，其元素都等于纯虚数单元，定义为 sqrt (-1) 。

trans-unit.source: Return a scalar, matrix, or N-dimensional array whose elements are all equal to the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个标量、矩阵或N维数组,其元素都等于圆的周长与直径之比。

trans-unit.source: Return a scalar, matrix, or N-dimensional array whose elements are all equal to the smallest normalized floating point number that is representable.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个标量、矩阵或N维数组,其元素都等于可表示的最小归一化浮点数。

trans-unit.source: Return a scalar, matrix, or N-dimensional array whose elements are all equal to the special constant used to designate missing values.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个标量数组、矩阵数组或N维数组,其元素都等于用于指定缺失值的特殊常数。

trans-unit.source: Return a simulation of the ARMA model.
trans-unit.target: 返回ARMA模型的模拟。

trans-unit.source: Return a sinetone of frequency <var>freq</var> with a length of <var>sec</var> seconds at sampling rate <var>rate</var> and with amplitude <var>ampl</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回频率的sinetone <var>freq</var> 与长度 <var>sec</var> 在采样率秒 <var>rate</var> 和与振幅 <var>ampl</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return a sparse identity matrix of size <var>m</var>x<var>n</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回大小为 <var>m</var> x <var>n</var> 的稀疏恒等矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return a string containing all the arguments concatenated horizontally with trailing white space preserved.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含所有参数的字符串,以水平方式连接,并保留尾部的空白。

trans-unit.source: Return a string containing all the arguments concatenated horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含所有参数的横向连接的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Return a string containing the elements of <var>arg</var> listed in columns with an overall maximum width of <var>width</var> and optional prefix <var>prefix</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，其中包含列中列出的 <var>arg</var> 元素，其总最大宽度为 <var>width</var> 和可选的prefix <var>prefix</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return a string containing the name of the function referenced by the function handle <var>fcn_handle</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，其中包含函数句柄 <var>fcn_handle</var> 引用的函数的名称。

trans-unit.source: Return a string of <var>n</var> blanks.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>n</var> 个空格的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Return a string of symbols in base <var>base</var> corresponding to the non-negative integer <var>d</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回以base为 <var>base</var> 与非负整数 <var>d</var> 对应的符号字符串。

trans-unit.source: Return a structure <var>info</var> containing the following information about <var>file</var> or file identifier <var>fid</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含以下有关 <var>file</var> 或文件标识符 <var>fid</var> 的信息的结构 <var>info</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return a structure containing Unix signal names and their defined values.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含Unix信号名称及其定义值的结构。

trans-unit.source: Return a structure containing a number of statistics about the current Octave process.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含当前Octave进程的一些统计数据的结构。

trans-unit.source: Return a structure containing an entry from the password database, opening it if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含密码数据库条目的结构,必要时打开它。

trans-unit.source: Return a structure containing information about the function handle <var>fcn_handle</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个结构，其中包含有关函数句柄 <var>fcn_handle</var> 的信息。

trans-unit.source: Return a structure containing the first entry from the password database with the user ID <var>uid</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个结构，该结构包含密码数据库中包含用户ID <var>uid</var> 的第一项。

trans-unit.source: Return a structure containing the first entry from the password database with the user name <var>name</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个结构，该结构包含密码数据库中包含用户名 <var>name</var> 的第一个条目。

trans-unit.source: Return a structure containing the system-dependent errno values.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含系统相关errno值的结构。

trans-unit.source: Return a structure describing the available audio input and output devices.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个描述可用音频输入和输出设备的结构。

trans-unit.source: Return a structure of object handles for the figure associated with handle <var>h</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回与句柄 <var>h</var> 关联的图形的对象句柄的结构。

trans-unit.source: Return a structure with information about the current status of the profiler. At the moment, the only field is ProfilerStatus which is either "on" or "off".
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含有关探查器当前状态信息的结构。目前，唯一的字段是 ProfilerStatus ，它为 "on" 或 "off" 。

trans-unit.source: Return a structure, <var>s</var>, whose fields describe the properties of the object, and its children, associated with the handle, <var>h</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回结构 <var>s</var> ，其字段描述对象的属性以及与句柄 <var>h</var> 关联的子对象。

trans-unit.source: Return a two-element row vector containing the current size of the terminal window in characters (rows and columns).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个双元素行向量,包含当前终端窗口的字符大小(行和列)。

trans-unit.source: Return a unique temporary filename as a string.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个唯一的临时文件名作为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Return a vector of indices of nonzero elements of a matrix, as a row if <var>x</var> is a row vector or as a column otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 返回矩阵非零元素索引的向量，如果 <var>x</var> 是行向量则返回一行，否则返回列。

trans-unit.source: Return a vector of the lengths of cell elements.
trans-unit.target: 返回单元格元素长度的向量。

trans-unit.source: Return a vector with the minimum, first quartile, median, third quartile, maximum, mean, standard deviation, skewness, and kurtosis of the elements of the vector <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有向量 <var>x</var> 元素的最小值，第一四分位数，中位数，第三四分位数，最大值，均值，标准差，偏度和峰度的向量。

trans-unit.source: Return all primes up to <var>n</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有素数，直到 <var>n</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return an m-element vector with i-th element given by sin (2 * pi * (i+d-1) / n).
trans-unit.target: 返回由 sin (2 * pi * (i+d-1) / n) i + d -1）/ n ）给定的第 i 个元素的 m 元素向量。

trans-unit.source: Return an M-by-N-by-3 RGB image of the figure. The size of the image depends on the formatting options. This is similar to taking a screen capture of the plot, but formatting options may be changed such as the resolution or monochrome/color.
trans-unit.target: 返回该图的M×N×3 RGB图像。图像的大小取决于格式化选项。这类似于对图形进行屏幕捕捉,但格式选项可能会改变,如分辨率或单色/彩色。

trans-unit.source: Return an array with the indices for each UTF-8 encoded character in <var>str</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组，其中包含 <var>str</var> 中每个UTF-8编码字符的索引。

trans-unit.source: Return an audioplayer object with data recorded by the audiorecorder object <var>recorder</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回带有音频记录 <var>recorder</var> 对象记录器记录的数据的音频播放器对象。

trans-unit.source: Return an entry from the group database, opening it if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 从组数据库中返回一个条目,必要时打开它。

trans-unit.source: Return an estimate of the reciprocal condition number if requested, otherwise warn of an ill-conditioned matrix if the reciprocal condition number is small.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求返回一个往复条件数的估计值,否则,如果往复条件数较小,则警告一个条件不良的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return an estimate of the reciprocal condition number if requested.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求,返回对等条件号的估计。

trans-unit.source: Return an identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个身份矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return an orthonormal basis of the null space of <var>A</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>A</var> 的零空间的正交基础。

trans-unit.source: Return an orthonormal basis of the range space of <var>A</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>A</var> 的范围空间的正交基础。

trans-unit.source: Return arguments can also be ignored using the same syntax. For example, the sort function returns both the sorted values, and an index vector for the original input which will result in a sorted output. Ignoring the second output is simple—don’t request more than one output. But ignoring the first, and calculating just the second output, requires the use of the ~ placeholder.
trans-unit.target: 返回参数也可以使用相同的语法忽略。例如，sort函数既返回已排序的值，又返回原始输入的索引向量，这将导致已排序的输出。忽略第二个输出很简单-不要请求多个输出。但是，要忽略第一个输出并仅计算第二个输出，则需要使用 ~ 占位符。

trans-unit.source: Return both the static and dynamic classpath in a single cellstr.
trans-unit.target: 返回单个单元格str中的静态和动态classpath。

trans-unit.source: Return cell array with the names of arguments that are using default values.
trans-unit.target: 返回使用默认值的参数名称的单元格数组。

trans-unit.source: Return central part of the convolution with the same size as A. The central part of the convolution begins at the indices floor ([size(B)/2] + 1).
trans-unit.target: 返回与 A 相同大小的卷积的中心部分。卷积的中心部分始于下标 floor ([size(B)/2] + 1) 。

trans-unit.source: Return frequencies in Hz instead of radians assuming a sampling rate <var>Fs</var>. If you are evaluating the response at specific frequencies <var>w</var>, those frequencies should be requested in Hz rather than radians.
trans-unit.target: 假设采样率为 <var>Fs</var> ,返回频率以Hz为单位，而不是以弧度为单位。如果要评估特定频率 <var>w</var> 的响应，则应以Hz而不是弧度为单位请求这些频率。

trans-unit.source: Return if a stopped child has been resumed by delivery of SIGCONT. This value may not be meaningful on all systems.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过交付 SIGCONT 恢复了被阻止的孩子，则返回。此值可能并非在所有系统上都有意义。

trans-unit.source: Return in <var>reg</var> the cell elements of <var>param</var> up to the first string element and in <var>prop</var> all remaining elements beginning with the first string element.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>reg</var> 的电池元件 <var>param</var> 到第一串元素和 <var>prop</var> 与第一串元素开头的所有剩余的元素。

trans-unit.source: Return indices of entries of <var>A</var> which begin with the string <var>s</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回以字符串 <var>s</var> 开头的 <var>A</var> 条目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Return information about <var>file</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关 <var>file</var> 的信息。

trans-unit.source: Return information about an audio file specified by <var>filename</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关 <var>filename</var> 指定的音频文件的信息。

trans-unit.source: Return list of parameter names already defined.
trans-unit.target: 返回已经定义的参数名称列表。

trans-unit.source: Return logical true if the answer is yes or false if the answer is no.
trans-unit.target: 如果答案是 "是",则返回逻辑上的 "真";如果答案是 "否",则返回逻辑上的 "假"。

trans-unit.source: Return logical true if the value of <var>x</var> has its sign bit set and false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <var>x</var> 的值设置了符号位，则返回逻辑true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Return only the first occurrence of the pattern.
trans-unit.target: 只返回模式的第一次出现。

trans-unit.source: Return only the parts which do not include zero-padded edges. The size of the result is max (size (a) - size (b) + 1, 0).
trans-unit.target: 仅返回不包括零填充边的零件。结果的大小为 max (size (a) - size (b) + 1, 0) 。

trans-unit.source: Return only the parts which do not include zero-padded edges. The size of the result is max (size (A) - size (B) + 1, 0).
trans-unit.target: 仅返回不包括零填充边的零件。结果的大小为 max (size (A) - size (B) + 1, 0) 。

trans-unit.source: Return output in <var>output</var> and optional status in <var>status</var>. If <var>scriptfile</var> is not an absolute filename it is searched for in the current directory and then in the Octave loadpath.
trans-unit.target: 在 <var>output</var> 返回输出，在状态中返回可选 <var>status</var> 。如果 <var>scriptfile</var> 文件不是绝对文件名，则在当前目录中搜索，然后在八度加载路径中搜索。

trans-unit.source: Return random integers in the range 1:<var>imax</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回范围为1的随机整数： <var>imax</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return recorder audio data as a matrix with values between -1.0 and 1.0 and with as many columns as there are channels in the recorder.
trans-unit.target: 将录音机的音频数据以矩阵的形式返回,矩阵值在-1.0和1.0之间,矩阵的列数与录音机的通道数相同。

trans-unit.source: Return sin (pi*x) / (pi*x).
trans-unit.target: 返回 sin (pi*x)/(pi*x)。

trans-unit.source: Return structure similar to Results, but for unmatched parameters. See the KeepUnmatched property.
trans-unit.target: 返回结构类似于 Results ，但参数不匹配。请参阅 KeepUnmatched 属性。

trans-unit.source: Return structure with argument names as fieldnames and corresponding values.
trans-unit.target: 返回以参数名作为字段名和相应值的结构。

trans-unit.source: Return system information in the structure.
trans-unit.target: 返回结构中的系统信息。

trans-unit.source: Return the 2-D convolution of <var>A</var> and <var>B</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>A</var> 和 <var>B</var> 的二维卷积。

trans-unit.source: Return the exclusive or of x and y.
trans-unit.target: 返回异或的 x 和 y 。

trans-unit.source: Return the <small>MATLAB</small> compatible maximum variable name length.
trans-unit.target: 返回<small>MATLAB</small>兼容的最大变量名长度。

trans-unit.source: Return the <var>k</var>-bit complement of integers in <var>A</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>A</var> 中整数的 <var>k</var> 位补码。

trans-unit.source: Return the <var>n</var>th output argument of the function specified by the function handle or string <var>func</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回函数句柄或字符串 <var>func</var> 指定的函数的第 <var>n</var> 个输出参数。

trans-unit.source: Return the <var>value</var> of the application data <var>name</var> for the graphics object with handle <var>h</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回带有句柄 <var>h</var> 的图形对象的应用程序数据 <var>name</var> 的 <var>value</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the <var>value</var> of the property identified by <var>name</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 <var>name</var> 标识的属性的 <var>value</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the CPU time used by your Octave session.
trans-unit.target: 返回Octave会话使用的CPU时间。

trans-unit.source: Return the Hankel matrix constructed from the first column <var>c</var>, and (optionally) the last row <var>r</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回从第一列 <var>c</var> 和最后一行 <var>r</var> （可选）构造的汉克矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return the Hilbert matrix of order <var>n</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>n</var> 阶的希尔伯特矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return the Moore-Penrose pseudoinverse of <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 的Moore-Penrose伪逆。

trans-unit.source: Return the Pascal matrix of order n if t = 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 t = 0 = 0，则返回 n 阶的Pascal矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return the Piecewise Cubic Hermite Interpolating Polynomial (pchip) of points <var>x</var> and <var>y</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回点 <var>x</var> 和 <var>y</var> 的分段三次Hermite插值多项式（pchip）。

trans-unit.source: Return the Rosser matrix.
trans-unit.target: 返回Rosser矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return the Toeplitz matrix constructed from the first column <var>c</var>, and optionally the first row <var>r</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回从第一列 <var>c</var> 和可选的第一行 <var>r</var> 构造的Toeplitz矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return the Vandermonde matrix whose next to last column is <var>c</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回最后一列为 <var>c</var> 的Vandermonde矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return the Wilkinson matrix of order <var>n</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回阶 <var>n</var> 的威尔金森矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Return the absolute name of <var>file</var> if it can be found in <var>path</var>.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以在 <var>path</var> 中找到 <var>file</var> 则返回文件的绝对名称。

trans-unit.source: Return the absolute name of file if it can be found in the list of directories specified by path.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以在 path 指定的目录列表中找到 file 则返回文件的绝对名称。

trans-unit.source: Return the absolute name of the loadpath element matching dir if it can be found in the list of directories specified by path.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以在 path 指定的目录列表中找到，则返回与 dir 匹配的loadpath元素的绝对名称。

trans-unit.source: Return the amount of storage allocated to the sparse matrix <var>SM</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回分配给稀疏矩阵 <var>SM</var> 的存储量。

trans-unit.source: Return the approximate minimum degree permutation of a matrix.
trans-unit.target: 返回矩阵的近似最小度换算。

trans-unit.source: Return the binomial coefficient of <var>n</var> and <var>k</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>n</var> 和 <var>k</var> 的二项式系数。

trans-unit.source: Return the bitwise AND of non-negative integers.
trans-unit.target: 返回非负整数的位数 AND。

trans-unit.source: Return the bitwise OR of non-negative integers <var>x</var> and <var>y</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回非负整数 <var>x</var> 和 <var>y</var> 的按位或。

trans-unit.source: Return the bitwise XOR of non-negative integers <var>x</var> and <var>y</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回非负整数 <var>x</var> 和 <var>y</var> 的按位XOR值。

trans-unit.source: Return the canonical name of file <var>fname</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回文件名 <var>fname</var> 的规范名称。

trans-unit.source: Return the central part of the convolution with the same size as A. The central part of the convolution begins at the indices floor ([size(B)/2] + 1).
trans-unit.target: 返回与 A 相同大小的卷积的中心部分。卷积的中心部分始于下标 floor ([size(B)/2] + 1) 。

trans-unit.source: Return the central part of the convolution with the same size as <var>a</var>.
trans-unit.target: 与同尺寸返回卷积的中央部分 <var>a</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the class of the object <var>obj</var>, or create a class with fields from structure <var>s</var> and name (string) <var>id</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回对象 <var>obj</var> 的类，或使用结构 <var>s</var> 和名称（字符串） <var>id</var> 的字段创建一个类。

trans-unit.source: Return the class path of the Java virtual machine in the form of a cell array of strings.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串单元格数组的形式返回Java虚拟机的类路径。

trans-unit.source: Return the coefficients of a polynomial p(x) of degree n that minimizes the least-squares-error of the fit to the points [x, y].
trans-unit.target: 返回次数为 n 的多项式 p （ x ）的系数，该系数使对点 [x, y] x ， y ]的拟合的最小二乘误差最小。

trans-unit.source: Return the coefficients of the derivative of the polynomial whose coefficients are given by the vector <var>p</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回多项式的导数的系数，其系数由向量 <var>p</var> 给出。

trans-unit.source: Return the coefficients of the integral of the polynomial whose coefficients are represented by the vector <var>p</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回多项式积分的系数，其系数由向量 <var>p</var> 表示。

trans-unit.source: Return the coefficients of the polynomial vector <var>f</var> after an affine transformation.
trans-unit.target: 仿射变换后返回多项式向量 <var>f</var> 的系数。

trans-unit.source: Return the collected profiling statistics in the structure T. The flat profile is returned in the field FunctionTable which is an array of structures, each entry corresponding to a function which was called and for which profiling statistics are present. In addition, the field Hierarchical contains the hierarchical call tree. Each node has an index into the FunctionTable identifying the function it corresponds to as well as data fields for number of calls and time spent at this level in the call tree.
trans-unit.target: 在结构 T 中返回收集的概要分析统计信息。平面配置文件在 FunctionTable 表字段FunctionTable中返回，该字段是一个结构数组，每个条目对应于一个被调用的函数，并且存在配置统计信息。此外，字段 Hierarchical 包含层次结构调用树。每个节点都有一个指向 FunctionTable 的索引，用于标识其对应的功能以及在调用树中此级别的调用次数和花费的时间的数据字段。

trans-unit.source: Return the column permutations such that the columns of s (:, p) are ordered in terms of increasing number of nonzero elements.
trans-unit.target: 返回列排列，以使 s (:, p) 的列根据非零元素的数量增加而排序。

trans-unit.source: Return the command line arguments passed to Octave.
trans-unit.target: 返回传递给Octave的命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: Return the command line path variable.
trans-unit.target: 返回命令行路径变量。

trans-unit.source: Return the commutation matrix K(m,n) which is the unique m*n by m*n matrix such that K(m,n) * vec(A) = vec(A') for all m by n matrices A.
trans-unit.target: 返回换向矩阵K（m，n）是唯一的 m * n x m * n 矩阵，这样对于所有m x n矩阵A，K（m，n）* vec（A）= vec（A'）。

trans-unit.source: Return the complex conjugate of <var>z</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>z</var> 的复共轭。

trans-unit.source: Return the complex conjugate transpose of <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 的复共轭转置。

trans-unit.source: Return the complex frequency response <var>h</var> of the rational IIR filter whose numerator and denominator coefficients are <var>b</var> and <var>a</var>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 返回其分子和分母系数分别为 <var>b</var> 和 <var>a</var> 的有理IIR滤波器的复数频率响应 <var>h</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the concatenation of N-D array objects, <var>array1</var>, <var>array2</var>, …, <var>arrayN</var> along dimension <var>dim</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回沿维度 <var>dim</var> 的ND个数组对象 <var>array1</var> ， <var>array2</var> ，…， <var>arrayN</var> 的串联。

trans-unit.source: Return the cubic spline interpolant of points <var>x</var> and <var>y</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回点 <var>x</var> 和 <var>y</var> 的三次样条插值。

trans-unit.source: Return the cumulative maximum values along dimension <var>dim</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回沿 <var>dim</var> 的累积最大值。

trans-unit.source: Return the cumulative minimum values along dimension <var>dim</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回沿 <var>dim</var> 的累积最小值。

trans-unit.source: Return the current date as a character string in the form DD-MMM-YYYY.
trans-unit.target: 以DD-MMM-YYY形式返回当前日期的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Return the current home directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的主目录。

trans-unit.source: Return the current local date and time as a date vector.
trans-unit.target: 以日期向量形式返回当前的本地日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: Return the current local date/time as a serial day number (see datenum).
trans-unit.target: 以序列号返回当前的本地日期/时间（请参见 datenum ）。

trans-unit.source: Return the current monthly calendar in a 6x7 matrix.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前6x7矩阵中的月历。

trans-unit.source: Return the current number of available processors.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前可用处理器的数量。

trans-unit.source: Return the current state of warnings identified by <var>id</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 <var>id</var> 标识的警告的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: Return the current time as the number of seconds since the epoch.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的时间,是自纪元以来的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Return the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的工作目录。

trans-unit.source: Return the data aspect ratio mode of the current axes.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前轴的数据纵横比模式。

trans-unit.source: Return the date/time input as a serial day number, with Jan 1, 0000 defined as day 1.
trans-unit.target: 将输入的日期/时间返回为序号,将1月1日0000定义为第1天。

trans-unit.source: Return the day of the week as a number in <var>n</var> and as a string in <var>s</var>.
trans-unit.target: 以 <var>n</var> 中的数字和 <var>s</var> 中的字符串返回星期几。

trans-unit.source: Return the decimal number corresponding to the binary number represented by the string <var>s</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回与字符串 <var>s</var> 表示的二进制数相对应的十进制数。

trans-unit.source: Return the default path for Octave.
trans-unit.target: 返回Octave的默认路径。

trans-unit.source: Return the difference in seconds between two time values returned from clock (t2 - t1).
trans-unit.target: 返回从 clock （ t2 - t1 ）返回的两个时间值之间的秒差。

trans-unit.source: Return the directory that holds the preferences for Octave.
trans-unit.target: 返回保存Octave偏好设置的目录。

trans-unit.source: Return the directory, name, and extension components of <var>filename</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>filename</var> 的目录，名称和扩展名。

trans-unit.source: Return the duplication matrix Dn which is the unique n^2 by n*(n+1)/2 matrix such that Dn vech (A) = vec (A) for all symmetric n by n matrices A.
trans-unit.target: 返回复制矩阵Dn，它是唯一的n ^ 2 x n *（n + 1）/ 2矩阵，这样对于所有对称n x n矩阵A，Dn vech（A）= vec（A）。

trans-unit.source: Return the dynamic classpath.
trans-unit.target: 返回动态classpath。

trans-unit.source: Return the effective group id of the current process.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前进程的有效组ID。

trans-unit.source: Return the effective user id of the current process.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前进程的有效用户ID。

trans-unit.source: Return the eigenvalues in a column vector. (default if only 1 output is requested, e.g., <var>lambda</var> = eig (<var>A</var>))
trans-unit.target: 返回列向量中的特征值。（如果仅请求1个输出，则为默认值，例如 <var>lambda</var> = eig（ <var>A</var> ））

trans-unit.source: Return the eigenvalues in a diagonal matrix. (default if 2 or 3 outputs are requested)
trans-unit.target: 返回对角线矩阵的特征值。(如果要求2或3个输出,则为默认值)

trans-unit.source: Return the eigenvalues of quasi-triangular matrices in their order of appearance in the matrix <var>A</var>.
trans-unit.target: 以在矩阵 <var>A</var> 中出现的顺序返回拟三角形矩阵的特征值。

trans-unit.source: Return the element-by-element left division of <var>x</var> and <var>y</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 和 <var>y</var> 的逐元素左除法。

trans-unit.source: Return the element-by-element multiplication product of inputs.
trans-unit.target: 返回输入的逐元乘积。

trans-unit.source: Return the element-by-element operation of <var>x</var> raised to the <var>y</var> power.
trans-unit.target: 将 <var>x</var> 的逐元素运算返回到 <var>y</var> 幂。

trans-unit.source: Return the element-by-element right division of <var>x</var> and <var>y</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 和 <var>y</var> 的逐元素右除法。

trans-unit.source: Return the elimination tree for the matrix <var>S</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回矩阵 <var>S</var> 的消除树。

trans-unit.source: Return the estimator <var>d</var> for the differencing parameter of an integrated time series.
trans-unit.target: 返回估计器 <var>d</var> 的积分时间序列的微分参数。

trans-unit.source: Return the exponential of a matrix.
trans-unit.target: 返回矩阵的指数。

trans-unit.source: Return the factorial of <var>n</var> where <var>n</var> is a real non-negative integer.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>n</var> 的阶乘，其中 <var>n</var> 是一个实数非负整数。

trans-unit.source: Return the file ID corresponding to a new temporary file with a unique name.
trans-unit.target: 返回与新的临时文件相对应的文件ID,名称唯一。

trans-unit.source: Return the file descriptor <var>fid</var> corresponding to a new temporary file with a unique name created from <var>template</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回与具有从 <var>template</var> 创建的唯一名称的新临时文件相对应的文件描述符 <var>fid</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the file descriptor flags for <var>fid</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>fid</var> 的文件描述符标志。

trans-unit.source: Return the file status flags for <var>fid</var>. The following codes may be returned (some of the flags may be undefined on some systems).
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>fid</var> 的文件状态标志。可能会返回以下代码（某些标志在某些系统上可能未定义）。

trans-unit.source: Return the filename extension used for MEX files.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于MEX文件的文件名扩展名。

trans-unit.source: Return the filter coefficients of a Bartlett (triangular) window of length <var>m</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回长度为 <var>m</var> 的Bartlett（三角形）窗口的滤波器系数。

trans-unit.source: Return the filter coefficients of a Blackman window of length <var>m</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回长度为 <var>m</var> 的布莱克曼窗口的滤波系数。

trans-unit.source: Return the filter coefficients of a Hamming window of length <var>m</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回长度为 <var>m</var> 的汉明窗的滤波器系数。

trans-unit.source: Return the filter coefficients of a Hanning window of length <var>m</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回长度为 <var>m</var> 的汉宁窗口的滤波系数。

trans-unit.source: Return the first ancestor of handle object <var>h</var> whose type matches <var>type</var>, where <var>type</var> is a character string.
trans-unit.target: 返回其类型与 <var>type</var> 相匹配的句柄对象 <var>h</var> 的第一个祖先，其中 <var>type</var> 是一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: Return the first entry from the group database with the group ID <var>gid</var>.
trans-unit.target: 从组数据库返回具有组ID <var>gid</var> 的第一个条目。

trans-unit.source: Return the first entry from the group database with the group name <var>name</var>.
trans-unit.target: 从组数据库返回具有组名 <var>name</var> 的第一个条目。

trans-unit.source: Return the first sentence of a function’s help text.
trans-unit.target: 返回函数帮助文本的第一句。

trans-unit.source: Return the full convolution. (default)
trans-unit.target: 返回完整的卷积。(默认)

trans-unit.source: Return the full convolution. (default) The result is a vector with length equal to length (a) + length (b) - 1.
trans-unit.target: 返回完整的卷积。（默认值）结果是一个长度等于 length (a) + length (b) - 1 的向量。

trans-unit.source: Return the full name of <var>file</var> beginning from the root of the file system.
trans-unit.target: 从文件系统的根开始返回 <var>file</var> 的全名。

trans-unit.source: Return the generalized transpose for an N-D array object <var>A</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回ND数组对象 <var>A</var> 的广义转置。

trans-unit.source: Return the hexadecimal string corresponding to the non-negative integer <var>d</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回与非负整数 <var>d</var> 对应的十六进制字符串。

trans-unit.source: Return the horizontal concatenation of N-D array objects, <var>array1</var>, <var>array2</var>, …, <var>arrayN</var> along dimension 2.
trans-unit.target: 返回沿着维度2 的ND数组对象 <var>array1</var> ， <var>array2</var> ，…， <var>arrayN</var> 的水平串联。

trans-unit.source: Return the hostname of the system where Octave is running.
trans-unit.target: 返回Octave运行所在系统的主机名。

trans-unit.source: Return the imaginary part of <var>z</var> as a real number.
trans-unit.target: 将 <var>z</var> 的虚部返回为实数。

trans-unit.source: Return the index idx of the closest point in x, y to the elements [xi(:), yi(:)].
trans-unit.target: 将 x, y ， y 中最接近点的索引 idx 返回到元素 [xi(:), yi(:)] xi （:)， yi （:)]。

trans-unit.source: Return the index <var>idx</var> of the closest point in <var>x</var> to the elements <var>xi</var>.
trans-unit.target: 将 <var>x</var> 中最接近点的索引 <var>idx</var> 返回到元素 <var>xi</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the integer corresponding to the hexadecimal number represented by the string <var>s</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回与字符串 <var>s</var> 表示的十六进制数相对应的整数。

trans-unit.source: Return the integer nearest to <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回最接近 <var>x</var> 的整数。

trans-unit.source: Return the integer nearest to <var>x</var>. If there are two nearest integers, return the even one (banker’s rounding).
trans-unit.target: 返回最接近 <var>x</var> 的整数。如果有两个最接近的整数，则返回偶数（银行取整）。

trans-unit.source: Return the internal pointer to the beginning of the group database.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向组数据库起点的内部指针。

trans-unit.source: Return the internal pointer to the beginning of the password database.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向密码数据库开头的内部指针。

trans-unit.source: Return the interquartile range, i.e., the difference between the upper and lower quartile of the input data.
trans-unit.target: 返回四分位数范围,即输入数据的上四分位数和下四分位数之差。

trans-unit.source: Return the inverse of the Hilbert matrix of order <var>n</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>n</var> 阶希尔伯特矩阵的逆。

trans-unit.source: Return the largest integer not greater than <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回不大于 <var>x</var> 的最大整数。

trans-unit.source: Return the largest integer that can be represented by a specific integer type.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个特定整数类型所能代表的最大整数。

trans-unit.source: Return the largest integer that can be represented consecutively in a floating point value.
trans-unit.target: 返回可以用浮点值连续表示的最大整数。

trans-unit.source: Return the largest value allowed for the size of an array.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组的最大允许值。

trans-unit.source: Return the last component of the value returned by program_invocation_name.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 program_invocation_name 返回的值的最后一个组成部分。

trans-unit.source: Return the last day of the month <var>m</var> for the year <var>y</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回月份的最后一天， <var>m</var> 全年 <var>y</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the length of the object <var>a</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回对象的长度 <var>a</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the logical AND of <var>x</var> and <var>y</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 和 <var>y</var> 的逻辑与。

trans-unit.source: Return the logical NOT of <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 的逻辑非。

trans-unit.source: Return the logical OR of <var>x</var> and <var>y</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 和 <var>y</var> 的逻辑或。

trans-unit.source: Return the matrix left division of <var>x</var> and <var>y</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 和 <var>y</var> 的矩阵左除法。

trans-unit.source: Return the matrix multiplication product of inputs.
trans-unit.target: 返回输入的矩阵乘积。

trans-unit.source: Return the matrix power operation of <var>x</var> raised to the <var>y</var> power.
trans-unit.target: 将 <var>x</var> 的矩阵幂运算返回到 <var>y</var> 幂。

trans-unit.source: Return the matrix right division of <var>x</var> and <var>y</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 和 <var>y</var> 的矩阵右除。

trans-unit.source: Return the n-D convolution of <var>A</var> and <var>B</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>A</var> 和 <var>B</var> 的nD卷积。

trans-unit.source: Return the name of the <var>n</var>-th argument to the calling function.
trans-unit.target: 将第 <var>n</var> 个参数的名称返回给调用函数。

trans-unit.source: Return the name of the currently executing file.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前正在执行的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Return the name of the host system’s default directory for temporary files.
trans-unit.target: 返回主机系统默认目录中临时文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Return the name of the host system’s directory for temporary files.
trans-unit.target: 返回主机系统目录的名称以获取临时文件。

trans-unit.source: Return the name of the top-level Octave installation directory for architecture-dependent files. If not specified separately, the value is the same as OCTAVE_HOME. OCTAVE_EXEC_HOME corresponds to the configuration variable <var>exec_prefix</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回与体系结构相关的文件的顶级Octave安装目录的名称。如果未单独指定，则该值与OCTAVE_HOME相同。OCTAVE_EXEC_HOME对应于配置变量 <var>exec_prefix</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the name of the top-level Octave installation directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回Octave顶级安装目录的名称。

trans-unit.source: Return the name of the top-level Octave installation directory. OCTAVE_HOME corresponds to the configuration variable <var>prefix</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回顶级八度安装目录的名称。OCTAVE_HOME对应于配置变量 <var>prefix</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the name that was typed at the shell prompt to run Octave.
trans-unit.target: 返回在shell提示下输入的运行Octave的名称。

trans-unit.source: Return the names of files in the directory <var>dir</var> as a cell array of strings.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串的单元格数组形式返回目录 <var>dir</var> 中的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Return the native floating point format as a string.
trans-unit.target: 返回本机浮点格式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Return the natural logarithm of the gamma function of <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 的伽马函数的自然对数。

trans-unit.source: Return the nearest neighbor.
trans-unit.target: 返回最近的邻居。

trans-unit.source: Return the next neighbor.
trans-unit.target: 返回下一个邻居。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of columns of a. This is equivalent to size (a, 2).
trans-unit.target: 返回的列数 a 。这等效于 size (a, 2) 。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of dimensions of <var>a</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的维数 <var>a</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of dimensions of each element.
trans-unit.target: 返回每个元素的尺寸数。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of elements contained within each cell element. The number is the product of the dimensions of the object at each cell element.
trans-unit.target: 返回每个单元格元素中包含的元素数。这个数字是每个单元格元素中对象的尺寸的乘积。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of elements in the object <var>a</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回对象 <var>a</var> 中元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of fields of the structure <var>s</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回结构 <var>s</var> 的字段数。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of nonzero elements in <var>a</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回非零元素的数量 <var>a</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of rows of a. This is equivalent to size (a, 1).
trans-unit.target: 返回的行数 a 。这相当于 size (a, 1) 。

trans-unit.source: Return the numeric value corresponding to the standard error stream.
trans-unit.target: 返回标准误差流对应的数值。

trans-unit.source: Return the numeric value corresponding to the standard input stream.
trans-unit.target: 返回标准输入流对应的数值。

trans-unit.source: Return the numeric value corresponding to the standard output stream.
trans-unit.target: 返回标准输出流对应的数值。

trans-unit.source: Return the numerical value of the WCONTINUE macro.
trans-unit.target: 返回 WCONTINUE 宏的数值。

trans-unit.source: Return the numerical value of the WNOHANG macro.
trans-unit.target: 返回 WNOHANG 宏的数值。

trans-unit.source: Return the numerical value of the WUNTRACED macro.
trans-unit.target: 返回 WUNTRACED 宏的数值。

trans-unit.source: Return the numerical value to pass to fseek to position the file pointer relative to the beginning of the file.
trans-unit.target: 返回数值以传递给 fseek ,以将文件指针相对于文件的开头定位。

trans-unit.source: Return the numerical value to pass to fseek to position the file pointer relative to the current position.
trans-unit.target: 返回数值以传递给 fseek ,以将文件指针相对于当前位置定位。

trans-unit.source: Return the numerical value to pass to fseek to position the file pointer relative to the end of the file.
trans-unit.target: 返回数值以传递给 fseek ,以将文件指针相对于文件末尾定位。

trans-unit.source: Return the p-norm of the elements of <var>A</var> along dimension <var>dim</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回维度为 <var>dim</var> 的 <var>A</var> 元素的p范数。

trans-unit.source: Return the periodogram (Power Spectral Density) of <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 的周期图（功率谱密度）。

trans-unit.source: Return the plot box aspect ratio mode of the current axes.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前轴的图框纵横比模式。

trans-unit.source: Return the position and type of mouse button clicks and/or key strokes in the current figure window.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前图形窗口中鼠标按钮点击和/或按键的位置和类型。

trans-unit.source: Return the position of the file pointer as the number of characters from the beginning of the file specified by file descriptor <var>fid</var>.
trans-unit.target: 以文件描述符 <var>fid</var> 指定的文件开头处的字符数返回文件指针的位置。

trans-unit.source: Return the position of the first occurrence of the string <var>t</var> in the string <var>s</var>, or 0 if no occurrence is found.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串 <var>t</var> 在字符串 <var>s</var> 中第一次出现的位置，如果未找到，则返回0。

trans-unit.source: Return the position of the last occurrence of the character string <var>t</var> in the character string <var>s</var>, or 0 if no occurrence is found.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串 <var>t</var> 在字符串 <var>s</var> 中最后一次出现的位置，如果未发现，则返回0。

trans-unit.source: Return the preference value corresponding to the named preference <var>pref</var> in the preference group <var>group</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回相当于命名偏好喜好值 <var>pref</var> 优先组 <var>group</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the previous neighbor.
trans-unit.target: 返回之前的邻居。

trans-unit.source: Return the prime factorization of <var>q</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>q</var> 的素数分解。

trans-unit.source: Return the process group id of the current process.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前进程的进程组id。

trans-unit.source: Return the process id of the current process.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前进程的进程ID。

trans-unit.source: Return the process id of the parent process.
trans-unit.target: 返回父进程的进程ID。

trans-unit.source: Return the range, i.e., the difference between the maximum and the minimum of the input data.
trans-unit.target: 返回范围,即输入数据的最大值和最小值之差。

trans-unit.source: Return the ranks (in the sense of order statistics) of <var>x</var> along the first non-singleton dimension adjusted for ties.
trans-unit.target: 沿调整后的第一个非单维度返回 <var>x</var> 的等级（在顺序统计意义上）。

trans-unit.source: Return the raw help text from the file <var>fname</var>.
trans-unit.target: 从文件 <var>fname</var> 返回原始帮助文本。

trans-unit.source: Return the raw help text of function <var>name</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回函数 <var>name</var> 的原始帮助文本。

trans-unit.source: Return the real group id of the current process.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前进程的真实组ID。

trans-unit.source: Return the real part of <var>z</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>z</var> 的实部。

trans-unit.source: Return the real user id of the current process.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前进程的真实用户ID。

trans-unit.source: Return the real-valued natural logarithm of each element of <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 的每个元素的实值自然对数。

trans-unit.source: Return the real-valued square root of each element of <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 的每个元素的实值平方根。

trans-unit.source: Return the reduced row echelon form of <var>A</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的简化行阶梯形式的 <var>A</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the remainder of the division x / y.
trans-unit.target: 返回除法 x / y 的余数。

trans-unit.source: Return the result of the colon expression corresponding to <var>base</var>, <var>limit</var>, and optionally, <var>increment</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回冒号表达式的结果，该结果对应于 <var>base</var> ， <var>limit</var> 和（可选） <var>increment</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Return the size along the <var>k</var>-th dimension.
trans-unit.target: 沿第 <var>k</var> 个维度返回尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Return the size of <var>val</var> in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>val</var> 的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Return the smallest and largest values of the input data <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回输入数据 <var>x</var> 的最小和最大值。

trans-unit.source: Return the smallest integer not less than <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回不小于 <var>x</var> 的最小整数。

trans-unit.source: Return the smallest integer that can be represented by a specific integer type.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个特定整数类型所能代表的最小整数。

trans-unit.source: Return the specific option parname from the optimization options structure options created by optimset.
trans-unit.target: 返回的特定选项 parname 从优化选项结构 options 通过创建 optimset 。

trans-unit.source: Return the spectral density estimator given a data vector <var>x</var>, window name <var>win</var>, and bandwidth, <var>b</var>.
trans-unit.target: 给定数据向量 <var>x</var> ，窗口名 <var>win</var> 和带宽 <var>b</var> ，返回光谱密度估计器。

trans-unit.source: Return the spectral density estimator given a vector of autocovariances <var>c</var>, window name <var>win</var>, and bandwidth, <var>b</var>.
trans-unit.target: 给定自协方差向量 <var>c</var> ，窗口名 <var>win</var> 和带宽 <var>b</var> ，返回频谱密度估计器。

trans-unit.source: Return the static classpath.
trans-unit.target: 返回静态classpath。

trans-unit.source: Return the stats for the nonzero elements of the sparse matrix <var>S</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回稀疏矩阵 <var>S</var> 的非零元素的统计信息。

trans-unit.source: Return the status of bit(s) <var>n</var> of the unsigned integers in <var>A</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>A</var> 中无符号整数 <var>n</var> 位的状态。

trans-unit.source: Return the substring of <var>s</var> which starts at character number <var>offset</var> and is <var>len</var> characters long.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>s</var> 的子字符串，该子字符串从字符号 <var>offset</var> 开始并且长度为 <var>len</var> 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Return the symmetric reverse Cuthill-McKee permutation of <var>S</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>S</var> 的对称反向Cuthill-McKee排列。

trans-unit.source: Return the system-dependent character used to separate directory names.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于分隔目录名的系统相关字符。

trans-unit.source: Return the text, s, justified according to pos, which may be "left", "center", or "right".
trans-unit.target: 返回根据 pos 对齐的文本 s ，可以是 "left" ， "center" 或 "right" 。

trans-unit.source: Return the transpose of <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>x</var> 的转置。

trans-unit.source: Return the type of the expression <var>expr</var>, as a string.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串形式返回表达式 <var>expr</var> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: Return the unique elements common to both <var>a</var> and <var>b</var> sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 返回按升序排序的 <var>a</var> 和 <var>b</var> 共有的唯一元素。

trans-unit.source: Return the unique elements exclusive to sets <var>a</var> or <var>b</var> sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 返回按升序排列的集合 <var>a</var> 或 <var>b</var> 排他的唯一元素。

trans-unit.source: Return the unique elements in <var>a</var> that are not in <var>b</var> sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <var>a</var> 中未按 <var>b</var> 升序排列的唯一元素。

trans-unit.source: Return the unique elements of <var>x</var> sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 返回按升序排序的 <var>x</var> 的唯一元素。

trans-unit.source: Return the unique elements that are in either <var>a</var> or <var>b</var> sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 返回按升序排列的 <var>a</var> 或 <var>b</var> 的唯一元素。

trans-unit.source: Return the value of the environment variable <var>var</var>.
trans-unit.target: 返回环境变量 <var>var</var> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Return the value of the named property <var>p</var> from the graphics handle <var>h</var>.
trans-unit.target: 从图形手柄 <var>h</var> 返回命名属性 <var>p</var> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Return the vector obtained by eliminating all superdiagonal elements of the square matrix <var>x</var> and stacking the result one column above the other.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过消除方阵 <var>x</var> 的所有超对角元素并将结果堆叠在另一列之上而获得的向量。

trans-unit.source: Return the vector obtained by stacking the columns of the matrix <var>x</var> one above the other.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过将矩阵 <var>x</var> 的一个列堆叠在另一个之上而获得的向量。

trans-unit.source: Return the vector of all positions in the longer of the two strings <var>s</var> and <var>t</var> where an occurrence of the shorter of the two starts.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个字符串 <var>s</var> 和 <var>t</var> 中较长者的所有位置的向量，其中两个中较短者开始出现。

trans-unit.source: Return the version number of Octave as a string.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串形式返回Octave的版本号。

trans-unit.source: Return the vertical concatenation of N-D array objects, <var>array1</var>, <var>array2</var>, …, <var>arrayN</var> along dimension 1.

trans-unit.source: Save a matrix in a text file without a header or any other information. The matrix must be 2-D and only the real part of any complex value is written to the file. Numbers are stored in single-precision format and separated by spaces. Additional options for the
trans-unit.target: 将矩阵保存在文本文件中,不含标题或任何其他信息。矩阵必须是二维的,并且只有任何复数的实数部分被写入文件。数字以单精度格式存储,并以空格分隔。矩阵的其他选项

trans-unit.source: Save figure windows specified by graphics handle(s) <var>h</var> to file <var>filename</var>.
trans-unit.target: 将图形句柄 <var>h</var> 指定的图形窗口保存到文件 <var>filename</var> 中。

trans-unit.source: Save graphic object <var>h</var> to the file <var>filename</var> in graphic format <var>fmt</var>.
trans-unit.target: 将图形对象 <var>h</var> 保存为文件格式为 <var>fmt</var> 的文件 <var>filename</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Save the data in HDF5 format but using only single precision. Use this format only if you know that all the values to be saved can be represented in single precision.
trans-unit.target: 以HDF5格式保存数据，但仅使用单精度。仅当您知道所有要保存的值都可以单精度表示时，才使用此格式。

trans-unit.source: Save the data in <small>HDF5</small> format. (HDF5 is a free, portable, binary format developed by the National Center for Supercomputing Applications at the University of Illinois.) This format is only available if Octave was built with a link to the <small>HDF5</small> libraries.
trans-unit.target: 以<small>HDF5</small>格式保存数据。（HDF5是由伊利诺伊大学的国家超级计算应用程序国家中心开发的免费，便携式二进制格式。）仅当Octave是使用指向<small>HDF5</small>库的链接构建的时，此格式才可用。

trans-unit.source: Save the data in <small>MATLAB</small>’s v6 binary data format.
trans-unit.target: 将数据保存为<small>MATLAB</small>的v6二进制数据格式。

trans-unit.source: Save the data in <small>MATLAB</small>’s v7 binary data format.
trans-unit.target: 将数据保存为<small>MATLAB</small>的v7二进制数据格式。

trans-unit.source: Save the data in Octave’s binary data format but using only single precision. Use this format only if you know that all the values to be saved can be represented in single precision.
trans-unit.target: 将数据保存为Octave的二进制数据格式，但仅使用单精度。仅当您知道所有要保存的值都可以单精度表示时，才使用此格式。

trans-unit.source: Save the data in Octave’s binary data format.
trans-unit.target: 将数据保存为八度的二进制数据格式。

trans-unit.source: Save the data in Octave’s text data format. (default).
trans-unit.target: 以八度的文本数据格式保存数据。（默认）。

trans-unit.source: Save the data in the binary format written by <small>MATLAB</small> version 4.
trans-unit.target: 以<small>MATLAB</small>版本4 编写的二进制格式保存数据。

trans-unit.source: Save the graphics handle(s) <var>h</var> to the file <var>filename</var> in the format <var>fmt</var>.
trans-unit.target: 将图形句柄 <var>h</var> 保存为文件 <var>filename</var> ，格式为 <var>fmt</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Save the named variables <var>v1</var>, <var>v2</var>, …, in the file <var>file</var>.
trans-unit.target: 将命名变量 <var>v1</var> ， <var>v2</var> ，… 保存在文件 <var>file</var> 中。

trans-unit.source: Save the unique portion of the current function search path that is not set during Octave’s initialization process to <var>file</var>.
trans-unit.target: 将当前函数搜索路径中在Octave初始化过程中未设置的唯一部分保存为 <var>file</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Script Files
trans-unit.target: 脚本文件

trans-unit.source: Scripts which reside in directories specified in Octave’s load path, and which end with the extension
trans-unit.target: 脚本位于Octave的加载路径中指定的目录中，并且以扩展名结尾

trans-unit.source: Search backward starting at the current line and moving ‘up’ through the history as necessary. This is an incremental search.
trans-unit.target: 从当前行开始向后搜索，并根据需要在历史记录中“向上”移动。这是一个增量搜索。

trans-unit.source: Search for <var>pat</var> in <var>str</var> and return the positions and substrings of any matches, or empty values if there are none.
trans-unit.target: 搜索 <var>pat</var> 在 <var>str</var> 和任何匹配的位置和子，或者有没有空值。

trans-unit.source: Search for pat in str and return the positions and substrings of any matches, or empty values if there are none. See regexp, for details on the syntax of the search pattern.
trans-unit.target: 搜索 pat 在 str 和任何匹配的位置和子，或者有没有空值。有关搜索模式语法的详细信息，请参见regexp。

trans-unit.source: Search for <var>pattern</var> in the string <var>str</var> and return the starting index of every such occurrence in the vector <var>idx</var>.
trans-unit.target: 在字符串 <var>str</var> 中搜索 <var>pattern</var> ，并在向量 <var>idx</var> 中返回每次出现的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: Search for the enclosing Delaunay convex hull.
trans-unit.target: 搜索包围的Delaunay凸壳。

trans-unit.source: Search for the string <var>str</var> for occurrences of characters from the set <var>chars</var>.
trans-unit.target: 从字符串 <var>chars</var> 搜索字符串 <var>str</var> 以查找是否出现字符。

trans-unit.source: Search for the string <var>str</var> in the documentation of all functions in the current function search path.
trans-unit.target: 在当前函数搜索路径中的所有函数的文档中搜索字符串 <var>str</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Search forward starting at the current line and moving ‘down’ through the history as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 从当前行开始向前搜索，并根据需要在历史记录中“向下”移动。

trans-unit.source: Search terminated by application.
trans-unit.target: 因申请而终止搜索。
